result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Information filed.   
Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 03-26-15 at 2:00 p.m.   
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.  
Minutes.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for trial.
Arraignment is set for 02-18-15 at 3:30 p.m.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.

Order Substituting Counsel.
It is hereby ordered that Attorney John Bilka is hereby substituted as counsel of record to represent the above named defendant in these proceedings.  Attorney John Bilka will be compensated by Manitowoc County at the rate of $70.00 per hour.  The Court previously signed an order dated 02-09-15 requiring the defendant the defendant to repay the county at the rate of $50.00 per month commencing on 03-01-15.  Judge Rohrer also signed an order dated 10-20-14 requiring the defendant to repay the county at a rate of $50.00 per month commencing 12-01-14.  Those payments plans are to be consolidated and are ordered to continued.
Initial appearance is reset to 02-16-15 at 9:30 a.m.
Initial appearance reset to 02-16-15 at 9:30 a.m.
Petition for Appointment of Counsel;  Affidavit of Indigency.  Order Appointing Attorney Donald Chewning  as counsel of record through Manitowoc County.

Defendant requests counsel and is referred to the public defender.   Initial appearance reset to 02-09-15 at 9:30 a.m.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 recognizance bond with the condition that defendant must report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and identifying information within 24 hours.  Bail furnished.  Minutes.

RE:  Bail jumping, on 12-04-14.
